amendment.description: Amendment allows nine amendments to be considered for up to twenty minutes each during House consideration of H.R. 1977.
amendment.purpose: An amendment that limits the debate time to twenty minutes on the following amendments: 11, 31, 40, 41, 57, 61, 65, 66, and 72 printed in the Congressional Record; and modifies amendment No. 57 to allow it to be offered to the end of the bill rather than to Title I.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A001) without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Dreier amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
